item.title: Cork Open Coffee Friday 11th at 10am
item.description: This weeks CorkÂ Open Coffee is in the Rubicon Centre, CIT Campus Bishopstown on Friday 11th from 10am - 12pm.This the last Cork Open Coffee of 2009. There will be 2 demos on Friday. John Dennehy will be talking about his great time tracking application at http://www.assemblypoint.com and Paul Brugger will be talking about a new Twitter application called @Localnumber which allows you to search and instantly receive contact phone numbers for businesses types in your area through Twitter.
